thread.title: Jeff Connaughton
thread.title_full: Express Medical Supply reviewed by Jeff Connaughton

author: Jeff Connaughton
title: Jeff Connaughton
text: They don't stand behind what they sell. Very rude on the phone. Purchased a gel mattress for my father and after only two days it's flat and doesn't work. They won't replace or have anything to do with what they sell. Don't buy from them.
